I can say that it is definitely the best intelligence game I have ever played in my life. Compared to the first game, there is not much change in its graphics. But the first game was very short for 3-3.5 hours of play time, and I don't know the puzzles maybe because I had not carved the second game before, but it came to me very easily. But first of all, since there are two different game modes for both one and two players in this game, there is a satisfying game time if you say that you will finish both.

Also, for both modes, I remember that we were wandering around the track for hours, both alone and with my friend. The puzzles on the tracks are really well thought-out, brain-burning.

As in the first game, it still has a story, and in the same way, we can say that half of the game should proceed as the parkour and the other half FPS. Definitely recommended for the type lover.

Multiplayer in a nutshell:
Can i do this?
Find out
I can't
Oh wait i can
Nice
Wait was that intended
